name: Pixy-Pic-Xel
summary:
Create colorful pixel-art images on grid-based logic puzzle game Pixy-Pic-Xel.
Featuring over 100 standard puzzles and 400 abstract art puzzles.

Reminiscent to games such as Nonograms, Griddlers and Picross.

--Features--
- Designed to be fun for beginners, as well as more advanced players
- Over 100 standard + 400 abstract puzzles (More than 500 Total)
- Simple puzzles designed mainly at 10×10 for smartphones (5×5 min / 20×20 max)
- Select any puzzle size you want to play from the start
- Logical puzzle solving
- Quick tutorial detailing how to play
- Easy-going music
- Complete game. No Ads or in-game purchases.
